title: A few T206 Magee Portraits for sale
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: A few T206 Magee Portraits for sale
posts.post_content:
Selling a few T206 Magee Portraits here, as you know any Magee portraits have become in high demand.  Please assume ppff, prices include shipping.  PM or email at [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url]

Pictures can be found here:  [url]https://imgur.com/gallery/Vymkvhn[/url]

PSA 2.5 P150 - $old
SGC 3.0 P150 - $old (very nice card)
SGC 4.0 SGC 350/30 (hard to find) - $900
